metadata.name: Beauty is in the eyes of the beholder
metadata.description: The flow of light coming from the heart is the main thing that can decorate any person. There is light in each of us. It appears when we begin to notice simple moments in our lives. By doing good deeds, we light this fire, water the flowers in our soul. It only matters how diligently a person takes care of his garden. With my collection, I want to show how we are able to accept the beauty of this world and share it with others.
